column6: 1. see also avatar. 2. Loanword from Sanskrit अवतार (IAST: avatāra, avatar)
Bade is tower for Balinese Hinduism cremation ceremony.
Banjar is administrative division below the village in Bali.
Bebali is a sacred dance in Bali.
Bebangkit is an offering for Durga.
Bebarongan is a type of roofing in Bali.
Beli is older brother in Balinese.
Bendesa is Balinese adat village head.
1. Dewa is a title for Brahmin caste in Bali. 2. Loanword of Sanskrit देव ((IAST: deva)).
